articles.title: Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
articles.contents:
Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
          
          
          Blog
          Projects
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
          
          
            
              Hi! I am a journalist covering the economy for The Jakarta Post. I love analyzing data to tell stories and talking to people to better understand the data that represent them. I also build tools to improve my workflow for writing stories and creating data visualizations

articles.title: Projects
articles.description: I really enjoy working on (side) projects related to data analysis and visualizations, especially on social and economic issues. I also love trying to make life slightly easier by building tools, such as R packages. Here are my projects
